title: Create Filter (Python Web3) is broken
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: 2.48.1-stable-674b77f0

OS & Version: Linux (Ubuntu 22.04)

Commit hash: 674b77f08

Erigon Command (with flags/config):  ./build/bin/erigon --datadir=mainnet_data --chain=mainnet --port=30303 --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --http.port=8545 --authrpc.port=8551 --torrent.port=42069 --private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9090 --http --ws --http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon,txpool --db.pagesize=16k --internalcl

Concensus Layer: Internal

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config): Internal

Chain/Network: ETH Mainnet

#### Expected behaviour

A list of events/log

#### Actual behaviour

Empty list

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

`
contract = w3.eth.contract(address=w3.to_checksum_address('0x3667d3d700dCa6d69a0dD0B5ff61Ac43C1cFa7BC'), abi=ERC20_ABI)

approval_events = contract.events.Approval.create_filter(
    fromBlock=0,
    toBlock='latest'
).get_all_entries()`

#### Backtrace
N/A


Works on geth.
